name: Bubbles (itch) (Lenny991)
description:
I think this game is one of the best looking games i've made but definitely not the most fun. Also the code is disgusting since i made this in about 4 hours or so (im not sure)

OOH now that i've played it even more playtesting it in the browser i've come to realize how good particles make a game look!!

the goal of this game is getting as many bubbles as possible with the fewest amount of bubbles used possible.
